agents.impl.dhcp

Interface DhcpClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DhcpClientAgent

    public interface DhcpClient
    Interface implementation of the DHCP protocol's methods for a client. The client is responsible for starting the DHCP process by broadcasting their discovery intent.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dhcpDiscover()
      Broadcasts a DHCP (Discover) message to attempt to find a DHCP server to handle future requests.
      void dhcpRequest(java.lang.String sender)
      Sends a request to the DHCP server that has replied via their 'Offer' message.
      void handleDhcp(Message message)
      An entry point for the DHCP methodology to where messages that are executed run this method.

    • Method Detail

      • dhcpDiscover

        void dhcpDiscover()
        Broadcasts a DHCP (Discover) message to attempt to find a DHCP server to handle future requests. Sends a message via the parent portal to broadcast DHCP discovery intent. DHCP servers will receive and handle this by initiating the DHCP process and offering their service(s).
        See Also:
        DhcpServer.dhcpOffer(agents.Message)

      • dhcpRequest

        void dhcpRequest(java.lang.String sender)
        Sends a request to the DHCP server that has replied via their 'Offer' message.
        Parameters:
        sender - The qualifying address of the DHCP server.
        See Also:
        DhcpServer.dhcpOffer(agents.Message), DhcpServerAgent.dhcpOffer(agents.Message)

      • handleDhcp

        void handleDhcp(Message message)
        An entry point for the DHCP methodology to where messages that are executed run this method. This method should implement the behaviour that distinguishes the messages from the server into the respective DHCP methods.
        Parameters:
        message - The message that is passed via MetaAgent.execute(agents.Message).
